document_data.caption: A map showing the River Estan in the Shalhoond.
document_data.name: River Estan
document_data.mainbody: The '''River Estan''' was a small waterway found [[Semphar]] in [[east Faer√ªn]] and the [[Hordelands]].
document_data.Geography: The River Estan originated deep within the northeast and eastern areas of the [[Shalhoond]] and the northern fringes of [[Teyla Shan]]. Many unnamed tributaries joined within the forest to form the main body of the river. The River Estan flowed southwest out of the forest to empty into [[Gbor Nor]]. The city of [[Estanil]] lay on its southern bank where it met Gbor Nor.
